root: ^What do you two think you’re doing?
^Hi boss! We're just, uh, making sure teh crown is safe in its box!
^I don't remember hiring someone with good grammar like you. How did you get in?
^A creepy guy told us you had a powerful crown and Archibald here wanted it, so now we're here
^Did he find you on the side of the road? Asked if you wanted a job? Has the head of an owl?
^You aren't the first one. There's been at least five before you who tried to rob us because of him.
^Evidently, we're victims. We're very sorry, so if you could just let us walk out...
^Not so fast. You broke into my establishment and tried to rob me.
^Just because you were tricked doesn't mean you're innocent.
^Let's leave your fate up to chance. You know how to play Blackjack?
^If you win, I'll let you go unharmed. Otherwise...hmm. Might string you up by your ankles and hang you at the entrance.
^Of course we know how to play Blackjack! My wonderful servant, you do right? Yeah, go. You got this.
